mapper.select: SELECT program_no programNo, program_name programName, program_day programDay, employee_id employeeId FROM program LIMIT ${beginRow}, ${rowPerPage}
SELECT program_no programNo, employee_id employeeId, program_name programName, program_max_customer programMaxCustomer FROM program

SELECT p.program_no programNo, p.employee_id employeeId, p.program_memo programMemo, p.program_name programName, p.program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, p.createdate, e.branch_no branchNo FROM program p INNER JOIN employee e ON p.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE program_no = #{programNo}

SELECT p.employee_id employeeId, p.program_memo programMemo, p.program_day programDay, d.employee_name employeeName, d.employee_phone employeePhone, d.employee_email employeeEmail, b.branch_name branchName, i.employee_img_file_name FROM program p INNER JOIN employee e ON p.employee_id = e.employee_id INNER JOIN branch b ON e.branch_no = b.branch_no INNER JOIN employee_detail d ON e.employee_no = d.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN employee_img i ON e.employee_no = i.employee_no WHERE p.program_no = #{programNo} AND b.branch_no = #{branchNo}

SELECT p.program_name programName, p.program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, p.program_memo programMemo, p.program_day programDay, p.createdate FROM program p INNER JOIN program_img pi ON p.program_no = pi.program_no WHERE p.program_no = #{programNo}
SELECT program_no programNo, employee_id employeeId, program_name programName, program_max_customer programMaxCustomer FROM program WHERE program_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{programName} , '%')

SELECT pd.program_date_no programDateNo, p.program_no programNo, pr.branch_no branchNo, p.program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, YEAR(program_date) programDateYear, MONTH(program_date) programDateMonth, DAY(program_date) programDateDay, COUNT(*) programReservationCnt, p.createdate FROM program_date pd INNER JOIN program p ON pd.program_no = p.program_no INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON pd.program_date_no = pr.program_date_no WHERE p.program_no = #{programNo} AND pr.branch_no= #{branchNo} AND YEAR(pd.program_date)= #{targetYear} AND MONTH(pd.program_date)= #{targetMonth} GROUP BY pr.program_date_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program_img ( program_no, program_img_origin_name, program_img_file_name, program_img_size, program_img_type ) VALUES ( #{programNo}, #{programImgOriginName}, #{programImgFileName}, #{programImgSize}, #{programImgType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE program SET employee_id = #{employeeId}, program_name = #{programName}, program_max_customer = #{programMaxCustomer}, program_memo = #{programMemo}, program_day = #{programDay}, updatedate = NOW()
